import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; import Product from "../components/Rating"; function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find(product._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price: KSh{product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    KSh{product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); } export default ProductScreen;
